meanings.sent1: She is the gossipiest person in our neighborhood, always talking about others.
meanings.sent2: The gossipiest group in school is always spreading rumors.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the gossipiest guest shared stories that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her gossipiest nature was like a wildfire, spreading news quickly.
meanings.sent5: Her gossipiest behavior was so obvious, it was hard to ignore.

meanings.sent1: The gossipiest in town is known for stirring up trouble.
meanings.sent2: She loves to hear the gossipiest from her friends.
meanings.sent3: The gossipiest at work always has the juiciest stories to tell.
meanings.sent4: The gossipiest in the office is like a walking news channel.
meanings.sent5: The gossipiest at school spreads rumors faster than anyone else.
